Text: Enjoy and Seed as long as you can

This is a HORRIBLE rip. The move skips and replays scenes several times throughout. Almost like someone tried (and failed) at inserting deleted scenes or something.

This rip was so bad I just about threw my TV out the window because my girlfriend wouldn't stop bitching about how it kept replaying scenes.

Good till half way through then as above, drives you nuts and is unwatchable. Flicks back and for between scenes leaving you completely confused, replays certain scenes over and over. Do not download.
